stepItems.title: How happy are you with the work completed?

description:
If you are not already collecting your visitors email address on a mailing list you are losing business!

Fear not we are here to help. Through this service we will do a complete setup of the mailchimp signup form to your website and style it to match the look and feel of your theme.

We will carefully review your website color fonts branding and overall graphic elements to introduce the form in its most aesthetically pleasing way possible. We will also advice on the precise positioning it will be most effective for your surfers to fill out.

What can I expect?

  • Setup mailchimp form on your website
  • Style mailchimp form to match the look and feel of your theme
  • Position the form in its optimal placement
  • Create the mailing list for subscribers
  • Configure your first autoresponder message
title: Add MailChimp form to website
